Address.label: Address
Address.value: AVENIDA RICARDO MARGAIN ZOZAYA NO.325,COLONIA VALLE DEL CAMPESTRE, SAN PEDRO GARZA GARCIA, 66265, Mexico

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Cemex is the largest ready-mix concrete company and one of the largest aggregates companies in the world. In 2021, the company sold roughly 67 million tons of cement, 49.2 million cubic meters of ready-mix, and 135 million tons of aggregates. As of Dec. 31, 2021, the company had annual cement production capacity of roughly 88.5 million tons.
